print(input().count('1'))
import re

with open("input.txt", "r") as f:
    data = f.read()
    print(data)
    print(re.sub(r'[^\w\s]','',data))



def count_one(s):
    return s.count('1')

def main():
    s = input()
    print(count_one(s))

if __name__ == '__main__':
    main()
